{{otheruses|Ubuntu (disambiguation)}}
'''Ubuntu Cola''' is a [[soft drink]] certified by the [[Fairtrade Foundation]]. Made with [[Fairtrade certification|Fairtrade]] sugar from [[Malawi]] and [[Zambia]], Ubuntu Cola is the first [[United Kingdom|UK]] cola to be Fairtrade certified.<ref name="SpecialityFood">{{cite web
